snippet.title: Last Time I Saw You - New Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
Last Time I Saw You is a coming-of-age narrative adventure about love and acceptance. An uplifting story, rich with complex characters, set in a vibrantly imagined vision of late 80s Japan. 

Join Ayumi on an exciting tale of self-discovery in which he'll face his first tentative steps into adulthood and confront the terrible curse that has fallen upon his hometown.

Coming to Steam, PlayStation 5, Nintendo Switch and Xbox in Autumn 2024!

Wishlist the game and play the demo on Steam!
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1909750/Last_Time_I_Saw_You/

- - - - -
Developer: Maboroshi Artworks
Publisher: Chorus Worldwide
- - - - -

Follow us on Twitter!
https://twitter.com/MaboroshiArt

This trailer shows a work in progress. Some things might change.

www.maboroshiartworks.com
Copyright © 2024 Maboroshi Artworks
